text: Yabonani uShaytân wenza izenzo zabo ezingcolileyo zaba ngathi zilungile kubo wathi kubo: “Akukho mntu ebantwini onokunoyisa nina namhlanje. Yaye mna ndingummelwane wenu (ndiya kuba nani ndinincedise).” Kodwa yathi yakujamelana imikhosi yomibini, wabaleka wemka yena esithi: “Inene mna andinanto yakwenza nani. Inene mna ndibona eningakuboniyo nina. Inene mna ndiyamoyika uAllâh kuba uAllâh Ubuhlungu esohlwayweni”
